availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Military Correspondence, 1863-1867

body.p:
No 1.
MONTHLY SUMMARY STATEMENT,
Dr. The UNITED STATESState of Kentucky, in account with S G Suddarth Q M General Quartermaster Kentucky Volunteers, at Frankfort in the month of September 1863 Cr.
DATE.
DOLLARS. CENTS. DATE.
DOLLARS. CENTS.
To amount of purchases within the month
1863 By balance per last statement
To amount of expenditures within the month Abst. A. 8054 36 Sept 3 By cash received from Tho E. Bramlette Govr $20000 00
To amount of advances made to officers within the month, per Abstract B 15431 29 25 " " " 30000 00
28 " Sale of Clothing 147 75
To balance due the the State of Kentucky, carried to next statement 26662 10
$ 50147 75
$ 50147 75

I CERTIFY that the above is a true statement of all the moneys which have come into my hands, on account of the Quartermaster's Department. during the month of September, 1863 and that the disbursements have been faithfully made. The balance due the State of Kentucky, is in Currency, and is deposited in BK of Ky at Frankfort

S G Suddarth Q. M. G.
Quartermaster
Genl of Ky

No. 1.
S. G. Suddarth
Q M Genls Quartermaster Ky, Volunteers.
SUMMARY STATEMENT.
For September 1863

ABSTRACT of ADVANCES made to Officers during the month.
DATE. WHERE. TO WHOM. DOLLARS. CENTS.
Amount.

I CERTIFY that the above Abstract is correct.
Quartermaster.
